item.description: Looking forward to seeing you all on Sunday.  Here's my address.  Let me know if you need directions.  Be sure to go to 108 North Avenue (not Street) and you can call me at 617 899-0740 if you get lost.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign that says 108 North on the Front Door

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Mother's Day Lunch at Tobie's in Haverhill
